title: Atocha to Puente de Segovia
knownFor: A scenic walk through historic neighborhoods ending at the beautiful Puente de Segovia with stunning views of the Royal Palace from across the Manzanares River.
route: Calle de Atocha → Antón Martín → Calle de Magdalena → Tirso de Molina → Calle de Segovia → Puente de Segovia (palace views from the river)
